children.text: Serialized SubLot (...) has not been located in the system. Please inbound the SubLot:

Unfortunately, this SubLot should be located in a different Warehouse. Currently, it is not possible to move Serialized SubLot between Warehouse. Please refer to documentation for further instruction in dealing with this issue.
Serialized SubLot (..) will be moved from Carrier ... to Carrier. Please provide a reason and a comment:

children.tooltip: Input Serial Number and press Enter.

layoutOnLoadActions.name: FetchCarrier
